metadata.description: The name of the suite
The suite type for resource tracking
The name of the service Tenant
The AAD tenant identifier (GUID)
Url of the AAD login page (example: https://login.microsoftonline.de/{0})
AAD application identifier (GUID)
AAD application identifier (GUID for the micro service)
The object ID of the service principal Microsoft.Azure.WebSites (f8daea97-62e7-4026-becf-13c2ea98e8b4).
Azure Maps Api Query key - default is disabled
The name of the storageAccount
The storage Sku name
The kind of the storage account.
Suffix added to Azure Storage hostname (examples: core.windows.net, core.cloudapi.de)
The name of the iotHub
The Iothub Sku name
Number of desired IoT Hub units.
The iot hub endpoint partition count
The Azure IoT Hub tier
Name of the environment. The name cannot include:   '<', '>', '%', '&', ':', '\', '?', '/' and any control characters. All other characters are allowed.
The minimum timespan the environment's events will be available for query. The value must be specified in the ISO 8601 format, e.g. "P30D" for a retention policy of 30 days.
DNS host of the rdx service.
Key to access the RDX web api.
Object Id of the AAD user or service principal that will have access to the environment. Available from the Get-AzureRMADUser or the Get-AzureRMADServicePrincipal cmdlets
Object Id of the AAD user or service principal that will have contributor access to the environment. Available from the Get-AzureRMADUser or the Get-AzureRMADServicePrincipal cmdlets
The Sku name of the serverfarm running the webapp-
The size of the container supported by the serverfarm running the webapp.
The number of instances supported by the serverfarm running the webapp.
Controls if the serverfarm running the webapp should be always on.
The KeyVault SKU to use.
Base fileame of the secret for the OPC UA communciation.
Value of the secret for the OPC UA communciation in base64 encoded Cert format.
Value of the secret for the OPC UA communciation in base64 encoded Pfx format.
Thumbprint of the secret for the OPC UA communciation.
Password for the secret.
URI containing files for deployment.
Username for the Virtual Machine.
Password for the Virtual Machine.
The VM size used for the virtual machine.
URI containing script to init the VM.
URI containing the archive with all files for the simulation.
AAD application secret.
AAD service object identifier (GUID)
Audience to validate token audience against.
The name of the solution
The name of the documentDB
The documentDB default consistency level for this account.
When documentDB consistencyLevel is set to BoundedStaleness, then this value is required, else it can be ignored.
When documentDB consistencyLevel is set to BoundedStaleness, then this value is required, else it can be ignored.
The name of the Event Hub
The event hub message retention in days
The event hub partition count
The name of the Event Hub
The Azure Event Hub SKU Tier
The Azure Event Hub SKU Capacity
Authorization Rule Name for Event Hub endpoint in Iot Hub
Suffix added to Service Bus endpoint
The name of the Linux Virtual Machine
The size of the Virtual Machine.
The Ubuntu version for the Virtual Machine.
The branch from which to procure scripts during VM initialization.
User name for the Linux Virtual Machine.

User password for the Linux Virtual Machines, must between 12 and 72 characters long and have 3 of the following: 1 uppercase character, 1 lowercase character, 1 number and 1 special character that is not slash (\) or dash (-)
The name of the azure website that you want to create. It will be of format {azureWebsiteName}.azurewebsites.net
The resource name of the KeyVault
The display name for the KeyVault
An optional prefix defining the registry and path of the micro services and modules that should be deployed.
This is the thumbprint of the HTTPS SSL Certificate
The certficate that needs to be updated to the VM

resources.comments: Event Hub Authorization for Iot Hub
resources.name: [concat(parameters('eventHubNamespaceName'), '/', parameters('eventHubName'), '/', parameters('eventHubAuthorizationName'))]

resources.comments: AppService plan to host the Application Gateway Web App
resources.name: [variables('hostingPlanName')]

resources.comments: Security rules used for the VM network interface
resources.name: [variables('networkSecurityGroupName')]

resources.comments: Network interface used by the VM
resources.name: [variables('nicName')]

resources.comments: One time script execution to prepare the VM environment
resources.name: [concat(parameters('vmNameTwin'), '/', 'scriptextensions')]

protectedSettings.commandToExecute: [concat('sh setup.sh ', ' --unsafe false --admin ', concat('"', parameters('adminUsernameTwin'), '"'), ' --registry-prefix ', concat('"', parameters('containerRegistryPrefix'), '"'), ' --hostname ', concat('"', variables('vmFQDN'), '"'), ' --ssl-certificate-key ', concat('"', parameters('adminPasswordTwin'), '"'), ' --ssl-certificate ', concat('"', parameters('remoteEndpointCertificate'), '"'), ' --auth-type aad ', ' --auth-audience ', concat('"', parameters('authAudience'), '"'), ' --aad-appid ', concat('"', parameters('aadClientIdTwin'), '"'), ' --aad-tenant ', concat('"', parameters('aadTenantId'), '"'), ' --aad-instance ', concat('"', parameters('aadInstance'), '"'), ' --iothub-connstring ', concat('"', 'HostName=', reference(variables('iotHubResourceId')).hostName, ';SharedAccessKeyName=', variables('iotHubKeyName'), ';SharedAccessKey=', listkeys(variables('iotHubKeyResource'), variables('iotHubVersion')).primaryKey, '"'), ' --docdb-connstring ', concat('"', 'AccountEndpoint=', reference(variables('documentDBResourceId')).documentEndpoint, ';AccountKey=', listkeys(variables('documentDBResourceId'), variables('documentDBApiVersion')).primaryMasterKey, ';', '"'), ' --iothub-name ', concat('"', reference(variables('iotHubResourceId')).eventHubEndpoints.events.path, '"'), ' --iothub-endpoint ', concat('"', reference(variables('iotHubResourceId')).eventHubEndpoints.events.endpoint, '"'), ' --azureblob-account ', concat('"', parameters('storageName'), '"'), ' --azureblob-key ', concat('"', listKeys(variables('storageId'), providers('Microsoft.Storage', 'storageAccounts').apiVersions[0]).keys[0].value, '"'), ' --azureblob-endpoint-suffix ',  concat('"', parameters('storageEndpointSuffix'), '"'), ' --release-version ', concat('"', variables('servicesBranch'), '"'), ' --iothub-consumer-group ', concat('"', variables('onboardingConsumerGroupName'), '"'), ' --evenhub-connstring ', concat('"Endpoint=sb://', parameters('eventHubNamespaceName'), '.', parameters('serviceBusEndpointSuffix'), '/;SharedAccessKeyName=', variables('eventHubKeyName'), ';SharedAccessKey=', listkeys(variables('eventHubKeyResourceId'), variables('eventHubApiVersion')).primaryKey, '"'), ' --eventhub-name ', parameters('eventHubName'))]
